message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $14,000.  Given its potential, I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget considerations, $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind. Would you consider $12,500?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and bring you a significant return on your investment.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $11,250. I'm confident that this product will be valuable to me, but I need to make sure it fits within my financial constraints.
